code: export var handlerIDToTag={};var handlers=new Map();var handlerTag=1;export function getNextHandlerTag(){return handlerTag++;}export function registerHandler(handlerTag,handler){handlers.set(handlerTag,handler);}export function unregisterHandler(handlerTag){handlers.delete(handlerTag);}export function findHandler(handlerTag){return handlers.get(handlerTag);}
